GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.17.15
GSD.description:
powerpc/kasan: Force thread size increase with KASAN

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 1fee1194e42625b0461fc0548f630671a2ac3f98, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit edbadaf0671072298e506074128b64e003c5812c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: powerpc/kasan: Force thread size increase with KASAN
